resources.string: The word to guess is represented by a row of dashes, giving the number of letters. If the guessing player suggests a letter or number which occurs in the word, the game writes it in all its correct positions. If the suggested letter or number does not occur in the word, the game draws one element of the hanged man stick figure as a tally mark. The game is over when: The guessing player completes the word or the poor man is hung. Play to save the man marked for death!
What do you want to do now?
You have guessed the correct word: %1$s, you have won: %2$d times, and lost %3$d times.
You fail! The word was: %1$s, you have won: %2$d times, and lost %3$d times.
